abstract: Wal-Mart’s ambitions into consumer banking may extend beyond what the retail giant had previously disclosed.
snippet: Wal-Mart’s ambitions into consumer banking may extend beyond what the retail giant had previously disclosed.
lead_paragraph: An Ohio representative is planning to release information today that suggests Wal-Mart’s ambitions into consumer banking may extend beyond what the retail giant had previously disclosed.

headline.main: Wal-Mart Is Said to Have Big Banking Plans
headline.print_headline: Wal-Mart Is Said to Have Big Banking Plans
